messages.message:
:white_check_mark: :dancing-penguin: <!here> 24.04.0-enterprise is now deprecated!

Thanks Amber, Tamir, and crew for following up (https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C06FA6A23/p1747837390175809?thread_ts=1746477275.542309&cid=C06FA6A23) and getting one more old release out of collective (and in my case, figurative :lolcry:) hair. :slightly_smiling_face:

I've renamed the branch to `DEPRECATED_release-24.04.0-enterprise` in line with our normal release deprecation procedure, turned down the certification and unit-test pipelines in Prod Jenkins, and *hibernated* the release sandbox `release-24-04-0`. I'll keep it around for a couple weeks to be sure, but then will delete it.
for reference, the 24.04 docs remain available on the web, but will no longer be updated
Iâ€™ve also deleted the maintenance schedule for the release 24-04 sandbox in Admiral so it no longer attempts to deploy :eyes:
